com.jme3.environment.generation

Class IrradianceMapGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.environment.generation.RunnableWithProgress
      • com.jme3.environment.generation.IrradianceMapGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class IrradianceMapGenerator
extends RunnableWithProgress
    Generates the Irrafiance map for PBR. This job can be lauched from a separate thread. TODO there is a lot of duplicate code here with the EnvMapUtils.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.jme3.environment.generation.RunnableWithProgress

      Generates the Irradiance map (used for image based difuse lighting) from Spherical Harmonics coefficients previously computed with EnvMapUtils.getSphericalHarmonicsCoefficents(com.jme3.texture.TextureCubeMap)

    • Constructor Detail

      • IrradianceMapGenerator

        public IrradianceMapGenerator(Application app,
                              JobProgressListener<java.lang.Integer> listener)
        Creates an Irradiance map generator. The app is needed to enqueue the call to the EnvironmentCamera when the generation is done, so that this process is thread safe.
        Parameters:
        app - the Application
        listener -

    • Method Detail

      • setGenerationParam

        public void setGenerationParam(TextureCubeMap sourceMap,
                               int targetMapSize,
                               EnvMapUtils.FixSeamsMethod fixSeamsMethod,
                               TextureCubeMap store)
        Fills all the genration parameters
        Parameters:
        sourceMap - the source cube map
        targetMapSize - the size of the generated map (width or height in pixel)
        fixSeamsMethod - the method used to fix seams as described here EnvMapUtils.FixSeamsMethod
        store - The cube map to store the result in.

      • run

        public void run()

      • generateIrradianceMap

        public TextureCubeMap generateIrradianceMap(Vector3f[] shCoeffs,
                                            int targetMapSize,
                                            EnvMapUtils.FixSeamsMethod fixSeamsMethod,
                                            TextureCubeMap store)
        Generates the Irradiance map (used for image based difuse lighting) from Spherical Harmonics coefficients previously computed with EnvMapUtils.getSphericalHarmonicsCoefficents(com.jme3.texture.TextureCubeMap)
        Parameters:
        shCoeffs - the SH coeffs
        targetMapSize - the size of the irradiance map to generate
        fixSeamsMethod - the method to fix seams
        store -
        Returns:
        The irradiance cube map for the given coefficients
